channel.title: The Personal Website of Iain R. Moodie
channel.description: Recent content on The Personal Website of Iain R. Moodie

item.title: Hello world
item.description: Hello! I figured I should update my personal site, partially as the old one had broken during a theme update, but also as a lot of exciting things are happening!

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Iain. And I am driven by a desire to understand the world around me.
